short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes height limitations on the categories list within the BigCommerce control panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin loads a simple CSS change when you are browsing in the BigCommerce control panel. It targets the category listing for stores running Categories V2, making the entire category tree visible instead of a narrow scrolling view.
